sentences.sContent: What is in question is properly speaking the same theme which is proposed to us by the discourse of Pausanias.
sentences.sCn: 受到质疑的，适当来说，是相同的主题，由保撒尼亚斯的论述跟我们建议。

sentences.sContent: Pausanias, who was a Greek writer 2000 years ago, has come on a magical journey to find out about the present day Olympic Games.
sentences.sCn: 帕萨尼亚斯是一位2000年前的古希腊作家，经过一路不可思议的跋涉后，来询问有关现代奥运会情况。

trans.tranCn: 帕萨尼亚斯（男名；古希腊人名）
